1370: Gheesen was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.
Got married to Euerardus at age 16 in 1370.
1396: Lost daughter Sophia when Sophia was 21 years old.
1371: Gave birth to Herbert in 1371 at age 17.
1372: Gave birth to Bartrarde in 1372 at age 18.
1375: Gave birth to Sophia in 1375 at age 21.
1376: Gave birth to Brundonis in 1376 at age 22.
1380: Gave birth to Erkenradis in 1380 at age 26.
1381: Gave birth to Lisebette in 1381 at age 27.
Lost daughter Lisebette when Lisebette was 1 years old.
1382: Gave birth to Heile in 1382 at age 28.
1386: Gave birth to Natelien in 1386 at age 32.
